attributes.action: Ensure that any MP breaking the Covid-19 guidelines is removed from office
attributes.additional_details: The general public are being asked to adopt difficult measures.  It is imperative that MP's are seen to be setting an explary example of how these measures must be carried out - breaking them is suggesting to the general public that it is acceptable to ignore them.  This will lead to further ignorance amongst the general public, which endangers us all.  MP's that do not respect and follow the guidance should be removed from office.
attributes.background: We are given instruction from our Prime Minister on the measures we must take to protect vulnerable people and help stop the virus from spreading.  The MP's must be seen to be following this guidance and if found to be ignoring it, should be held accountable for this and be removed from Parliament.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It's already the case that MPs who damage the integrity and reputation of the House of Commons can be subject to sanctions.  You can find out more here:

https://publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm201719/cmcode/1882/188202.htm#_idTextAnchor003
	
You can find out more about the Standards and how to make a complaint here:

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/standards-and-financial-interests/parliamentary-commissioner-for-standards/
